Celestial Canvas

Package to create composite images from astronomical data

class composite.Composite(red, green, blue)

Composite Image created using three Image objects.

Parameters:

  • red (array) – array containing data of the red channel in the image

  • green (array) – array containing data of the green channel in the image

  • blue (array) – array containing data of the blue channel in the image

  • comp (array) – array containing the data of the red, green and blue channels stacked depth wise

plot(title='')

Plots the constructed composite image

Parameters:

title (str, optional) – String containing the title of the image. Defaults to an empty string

class image.Image(data)

Image object containing the data of one color.

Parameters:

  • data (array) – array containing data of the image whenit was initialized. Used for reset.

  • rescaled_data (array) – array containing data of iamge after it was modified.

flip_leftright()

Flips the data of the image along the 1 axis (left/right)

Returns:

An Image object that was flipped left to right

Return type:

Image

flip_updown()

Flips the data of the image along the 0 axis (up/down)

Returns:

An Image object that was flipped upside

Return type:

Image

normalize()

Normalizes the data of the image using the maximum and minimum values

Returns:

An Image object that was normalized

Return type:

Image

plot(title='')

Plots the constructed composite image

Parameters:

title (str, optional) – String containing the title of the image. Defaults to an empty string

rescale_root(root)

Rescales the data by taking the power using 1/root

Parameters:

root (float) – root used for the rescaling

Returns:

An Image object that was rescaled using the root parameter

Return type:

Image

reset()

Resets recaled_data to data.

Returns:

An Image object were recaled_data was reset to data

Return type:

Image

rotate_transpose()

Rotates the data of the image by transposing it

Returns:

An Image object that was rotated by transposing it

Return type:

Image
